q: "not committed" to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012. Colin Powell , a retired Army general, said he won't decide whom to vote for until he sees all the candidates. Right now I do not see on the Republican side any one individual who I think is going to emerge at the top of the pile, he said, adding he thinks Barack Obama "is doing a good job right now."
